name: Fortress in the Sky
description:
A 2D platformer where you follow the legend to find the mysterious celestial civilization, fighting off cute monsters and running impressive parkours along the way. 

Controls: 

Move your character with [A] and [D]. Jump with [Space].

You will unlock many more abilities with detailed instructions as you play :)

A game created by Sicheng Yi and Yangming Hu. 

The game was made for DevSquad Academy Jam.
